title: Hairstyles

properties.name: description
properties.value: Hairstyles are the possible appearances of a character's hair. A hairstyle is chosen upon starting the game on Tutorial Island, and can be changed later by talking to the Hairdresser in Falador, costing 1000 coins each for a male character's hair or beard, and 2000 coins for a female character's hair. Hairstyles come in a variety of colours, and there are several hairstyles that are exclusive to male and female characters.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Hairstyles
The hairdresser interface for a male character.

Hairstyles are the possible appearances of a character's hair. A hairstyle is chosen upon starting the game on Tutorial Island, and can be changed later by talking to the Hairdresser in Falador, costing 1000 coins each for a male character's hair or beard, and 2000 coins for a female character's hair. Hairstyles come in a variety of colours, and there are several hairstyles that are exclusive to male and female characters.

Hairstyles can also be changed for free via the dresser space in the player's player owned house. Higher grades offer more styles and colours to choose from, given the player has the required construction level to build them.

Contents

  • 1 Available hairstyles
    • 1.1 Male hairstyles
    • 1.2 Female hairstyles
    • 1.3 Facial hair (male only)
  • 2 Colours
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 Trivia

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
4 June 2020
(update)

The hairstyle "The Supreme Leader" was renamed to "Front split".

18 December 2014
(update | poll)

The "Front split" hairstyle was added, then called "The Supreme Leader".

20 March 2014
(update | poll)
  • 7 new male hairstyles and facial hairstyles and 12 new female hairstyles have been added to the Falador hairdresser and the account creation menu.
  • The Falador hairdresser now offers all the colours that were available on Tutorial Island.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The hairstyle "Front split" was previously called "The Supreme Leader", a reference to Kim Jong-un.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
[[File:Hairdresser's Salon interface.png|400px|thumb|The hairdresser interface for a male character.]]
'''Hairstyles''' are the possible appearances of a character's hair. A hairstyle is chosen upon starting the game on [[Tutorial Island]], and can be changed later by talking to the [[Hairdresser]] in [[Falador]], costing 1000 coins each for a male character's hair or beard, and 2000 coins for a female character's hair. Hairstyles come in a variety of colours, and there are several hairstyles that are exclusive to [[gender|male and female]] characters.

Hairstyles can also be changed for free via the [[dresser space]] in the player's [[player owned house]]. Higher grades offer more styles and colours to choose from, given the player has the required [[construction]] level to build them.

{{Subject changes

}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 18 December 2014
|update = Christmas 2014
|poll = Old School Content Poll 28
|change = The "Front split" hairstyle was added, then called "The Supreme Leader".
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 20 March 2014
|update = Fresh 'Old' Fashion
|poll = Old School feature poll 17
|change = 
*7 new male hairstyles and facial hairstyles and 12 new female hairstyles have been added to the Falador [[hairdresser]] and the account creation menu.
*The Falador hairdresser now offers all the colours that were available on [[Tutorial Island]].
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
*The hairstyle "Front split" was previously called "The Supreme Leader", a reference to {{wp|Kim Jong-un}}.
